sys_atf_test.description:
Successfully run a single incident workflow.
⚠️ Prerequisites: - The integration is set up in general (PagerDuty settings page filled in) - You are switched to the application scope (PagerDuty Incident Resolution Platform) - You are running tests as a System Administrator user with the [admin] role - Your PagerDuty account does NOT have an escalation policy with the name [SN:ATF ServiceNow incident workflow runners] or it will be removed - Your ServiceNow instance does NOT have an assignment group with the name [ATF ServiceNow incident workflow runners] or the test will fail - You have a workflow in PagerDuty with this exact name: [ATF ServiceNow incident workflow] and with NO description - You have a service [1] in PagerDuty which is applied to the workflow above - Open every row in [Test Run Data Sets] tab below on this page and in every row choose the configuration item, which is linked to the service [1] above
sys_atf_test.name: PD: Incident Workflows - 1 - happy path
